text: Aikeni ana a masiye pa mayesero mpakana pamene afika poti atha msinkhu. Ngati inu muona kuti ndi a maganizo okhazikika, apatseni chuma chawo ndipo musawaonongere iwo chuma chawo asanathe msinkhu. Munthu amene ali olemera asagwiritse ntchito katundu wa ana a masiye amene ali kumuyangâ€™anira ndipo munthu osauka agwiritse ntchito chuma cha ana a masiye mosamala ndi mwa chilungamo. Pamene inu muwapatsa chuma chawo, itanani ena kuti akhale mboni; Mulungu ndi wokwana kukhala mboni pa zonse zimene muchita
